trans-unit.source: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 定義從 Windows Forms 應用程式中列印時會將輸出傳送至印表機的可重複使用物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class, set properties such as the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>類別中，設定屬性，例如<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>，並呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>開始列印程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event where you specify the output to print, by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件，您可以指定要列印，請使用輸出<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需從 Windows Form 應用程式的列印功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 列印支援](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要從 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式列印，請參閱<xref:System.Printing>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints the file named C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt on the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列印名 C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt 為預設印表機上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, create a new Windows Forms project and paste the example code into the form, replacing the file contents.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例時，建立新的 Windows Form 專案並將範例程式碼貼到表單，取代檔案內容。

trans-unit.source: For C#, you will need to delete the Form1.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: C# 中，您必須刪除 Form1.Designer.cs 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Also, change the path to the file you want to print.
trans-unit.target: 此外，變更您想要列印的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that each line fits within the page width.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要每一行符合頁面寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms>, <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms>， <xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>，和<xref:System.IO>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會初始化所有的欄位，根據預設印表機。

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言之後建立新, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>，設定會影響到輸出的印表機和頁面設定<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定為橫向，文件的頁面方向及列印的文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>，和<xref:System.IO>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print" /> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print" /> 方法時發生 (在文件第一頁列印之前)。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您會處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>初始化字型、 檔案資料流及其他資源列印程序期間使用的事件。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將加入的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當發生事件時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面設定，其會使用為所有要列印頁面的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> that specifies the default page settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定文件預設頁面設定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify several default page settings through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定數個預設的頁面設定透過<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies whether the page prints in color, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies the margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會指定是否在 色彩列印頁面<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會指定橫向或縱向方向，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性指定的頁面邊界。

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event and modify the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定網頁的網頁為基礎的設定，請處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>或<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>事件及修改<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>引數包含在<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>或<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>分別。

trans-unit.source: After printing has started, changes to page settings through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> property will not affect pages being printed.
trans-unit.target: 已開始列印之後，變更為頁面設定透過<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>屬性將不會影響列印的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定為橫向，文件的頁面方向及列印的文件。

trans-unit.source: The example makes three assumptions: that a variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會進行三個假設： 變數名為`filePath`列印; 已設定為檔案的路徑方法名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>已定義事件，;，但變數名為`printer`已設定印表機的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>，和<xref:System.IO>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在列印文件時顯示的文件名稱 (例如，在列印狀態對話方塊中或在印表機佇列中)。

trans-unit.source: The document name to display while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: 列印文件時要顯示的文件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is "document".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是「文件」。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A> property does not specify the file to print.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>屬性不會指定要列印檔案。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以指定列印處理輸出<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A> to a user-friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列印文件的第一頁中的色彩，如果印表機支援此功能，並設定<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>使用者易記的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> events are handled.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>被處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於文件最後一頁列印時。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您會處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>事件來釋放字型、 檔案資料流及其他資源用在列印的過程中，例如字型。

trans-unit.source: You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: 您表示有沒有更多的頁面，藉由設定列印<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`false`中<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>如果列印處理序已取消，或列印程序期間發生例外狀況，也就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將加入的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當發生事件時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: It is called after the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print" /> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print" /> 方法之後和文件的第一頁列印之前呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint%2A>方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint%2A> method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生的類別呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint%2A>方法，它就會引發<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is a good place for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是初始化的理想位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: It is called when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: 在文件最後一頁已列印時呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A>方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A> method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A>如果列印處理序已取消，或列印程序期間發生例外狀況，也會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A> method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生的類別呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint%2A>方法，它就會引發<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnEndPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is a good place for uninitialization.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是針對未初始化的好地方。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: It is called before a page prints.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面列印之前呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage%2A>方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage%2A> method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生的類別呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage%2A>方法，它就會引發<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnPrintPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: It is called immediately before each <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在每個 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> 事件之前立即呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings%2A> method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生的類別呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings%2A>方法，它就會引發<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings(System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings(System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings(System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OnQueryPageSettings(System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出與頁面相關的圖形物件位置是否正好在使用者指定的邊界內部，或在頁面可列印區域的左上角。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; <see langword="false" /> if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖形原點起始於頁面邊界，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果圖形原點在可列印頁面的左上角，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin.
trans-unit.target: 計算可列印的區域必須知道紙張、 頁面的邊界的實體大小和位置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>原點的物件。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object location takes into account the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value and the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件位置列入考量<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值與可列印的頁面區域。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A> is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A>是`false`，用於決定位置的頁面可列印區域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件來源，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A> is `true`, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set for 1 inch on each side, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A>是`true`，和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>每一邊設定為 1 英吋<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件中包含<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>從左邊和頁面頂端的位置 1 英吋。

trans-unit.source: If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面可列印區域.25 英吋每一端上和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.OriginAtMargins%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件是位於的.25 英吋，從左邊和頁面的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.
trans-unit.target: 可列印的頁面區域印表機而有所不同，而且不保證是對稱。

trans-unit.source: Starts the document's printing process.
trans-unit.target: 啟動文件的列印程序。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event and by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的輸出，以處理來列印<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件及使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>納入<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify which printer should print the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來指定哪些印表機的列印文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method prints the document without using a print dialog.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>方法列印文件，而不需要使用列印對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>當您想要提供使用者將能夠選擇列印設定。

trans-unit.source: If an exception that is not handled by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式未處理的例外狀況<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>方法會擲回在列印期間： 列印文件的已中止。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints the file that is specified through the command line to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列印的檔案，指定透過命令列至預設印表機。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that each line fits within the page width.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要每一行符合頁面寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel>, <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, <xref:System.IO>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel>， <xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>， <xref:System.IO>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> 屬性命名的印表機並不存在。

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 受限制的對話方塊從安全的列印。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指引列印程序的列印控制程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: 指引列印程序的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A print controller guides the printing process in several ways.
trans-unit.target: 列印控制程式指引列印程序幾種方式的內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要列印文件，您需要將它轉換成<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>指定要繪製圖形影像預覽列印或實際列印文件的印表機上的何處。

trans-unit.source: A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval.
trans-unit.target: 列印的控制站也可以指定是否要立即列印文件，或先等待指定的間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following code example requires that you have created an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class that is named `myPrintDocument`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例需要您已建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名為的`myPrintDocument`。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> class, assigns it to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintController%2A> property of `myPrintDocument`, and prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>類別中，將其指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintController%2A>屬性`myPrintDocument`，列印的文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 受限制的對話方塊從安全的列印。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定列印文件的印表機。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> that specifies where and how the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 指定何處和如何列印文件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> with its properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是其屬性設成預設值的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify several printer settings through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定幾個印表機設定，透過<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify the printer to use, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify the range of pages you want to print.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來指定您想要列印的份數<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性可指定印表機来使用，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來指定您想要列印的頁面範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例在指定的印表機上列印文件。

trans-unit.source: The example makes three assumptions: that a variable names `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會進行三個假設： 的變數名稱`filePath`列印; 已設定為檔案的路徑方法名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>已定義事件，;，但變數名為`printer`已設定印表機的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>，和<xref:System.IO>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要目前頁面的列印輸出時。

trans-unit.source: To specify the output to print, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要列印的輸出，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定要列印的文字行，繪製文字使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 除了指定輸出，您可以指出是否有其他頁面，以設定列印<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`，表示已沒有更多的頁面列印。

trans-unit.source: Individual page settings can also be modified through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and the print job can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過修改個別的頁面設定<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>且可以取消列印工作，藉由設定<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要列印的文件使用不同頁面設定每一頁，處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>事件。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將加入的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當發生事件時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。

trans-unit.source: For another example, see [How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需其他範例，請參閱[如何： 列印 Windows Form 中的多頁文字檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>，和<xref:System.IO>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before each <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> 事件之前立即發生。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: 很可能要列印的文件使用不同頁面設定每一頁。

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定頁面設定所修改的個別屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性或屬性設定為<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings.
trans-unit.target: 所做的變更<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>影響只有目前頁面上，不在文件的預設頁面的設定。

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 也可以藉由設定取消列印工作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`如<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將加入的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當發生事件時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event to modify printer settings, the performance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> control will not improve even if an optimization configuration switch is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>修改印表機設定、 效能事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>控制項不會改善，即使已設定最佳化組態參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [PrintPreviewDialog control overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[PrintPreviewDialog 控制項概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列印文件的第一頁中的色彩，如果印表機支援它。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> events are handled.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>被處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: The `currentPageNumber` variable is incremented after every page is printed in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, which is not shown.
trans-unit.target: `currentPageNumber`變數會增加之後每一頁列印在,<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件，不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>此範例中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
trans-unit.target: 提供列印文件的相關資訊 (以字串形式)。

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。
